title: I love to code!
details: I'm a Full Stack Developer with a preference for Backend. The last few years I've been programming in Javascript and Ruby, furthermore I recently started learning C++ and Elixir. In my spare time I like to create games and minor apps.

title: What skills do I bring?
details: Skills can always be taught, and tech will keep on being renewed. Always, I bring a positive attitude, a will to learn & a great team spirit!

title: Let's be honest.
details: I'm not currently looking for a new opportunity, in fact, I'm very happy where I am. Nevertheless, what does attract me as an employee is an awesome company policy, daily pair/mob programming, test driven development & an interesting product.
